TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件为处理回发事件而必须实现的方法。

span.span: Defines the method ASP.NET server controls must implement to handle postback events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建一个捕获从浏览器的窗体提交信息的服务器控件，则必须实现此接口。To create a server control that captures form submission information from the browser, you must implement this interface. 有关如何使用此接口的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information on how to use this interface, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义按钮服务器控件，将导致回发，捕获回发事件使用方法，并引发`Click`服务器上的事件。The following code example defines a custom button server control that causes postback, captures the postback event using the method, and raises a `Click` event on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 表示要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件参数的 。

span.span: A that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.

summary.span: 当由类实现时，使服务器控件能够处理将窗体发送到服务器时引发的事件。

span.span: When implemented by a class, enables a server control to process an event raised when a form is posted to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页的值传递`eventArgument`参数`RaisePostBackEvent`方法实现的控件接口。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the `RaisePostBackEvent` method of the control that implements the interface. 此控件也会呈现导致回发发生的 HTML 元素。This control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback to occur. 如果该控件呈现的回发的客户端脚本，将从脚本的自变量传递中`eventArgument`参数。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回发导致一个简单的操作，提交`eventArgument`参数是`null`。If the postback is caused by a simple submit operation, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`. 此方法提供的功能对于由 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件实现的很多事件。This method provides the functionality for many events implemented by HTML and Web server controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义按钮服务器控件，将导致回发，捕获回发事件使用方法，并引发`Click`服务器上的事件。The following code example defines a custom button server control that causes postback, captures the postback event using the method, and raises a `Click` event on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
